short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lighthouse allows you to customize your new tab, but also allows you to use more cool features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lighthouse is a new TAB plugin based on the vue framework and other component libraries. It redefines your new TAB in Chrome. Compared to the Chrome New TAB, you can use Lighthouse to customize the background image, adjust the brightness and blur. In addition, it also integrates weather, time, calendar and other functions. Simple interface, functional utility is our characteristics, welcome to use.

Lighthous Features:

1. Exquisite layout: elegant design style, popular world icon.

2. 4k wallpaper: Select 20 photos from the massive wallpaper library as the initial background image. Users can use our local wallpaper, change to their own wallpaper, or download the current wallpaper through the Settings.

3. Personalize search ads: You can choose which search engine you want to use. Of course, we use Bing search ads because we need some revenue to keep growing

4. Background brightness, blur degree, full screen adjustment, simple mode and other functions

5. Feedback function, users can send feedback to us at any time, but the call is the user's local mail, hope you can understand

6. Add random wallpaper function, use third party api, and can use gradient background, later can add user-defined gradient function

7. Weather api, which can search the weather of the current city within seven days

8. Time Zone function: Six time zones are displayed on the Settings page

9. Login and registration function: Users can log in our plug-in to use more functions, such as calendar planning, countdown record and so on.

10. Good Sentence of the Day, we show a good Sentence of the Day api on the home page

11. User feedback is important. We hope you will send us an email and we will respond within 48 hours

These functions need to be stored locally in the browser, so hopefully it will pass. Your support is my greatest motivation
